thread.section_title: Archive News & Video for Wednesday, 28 Feb 2018 | Reuters.com
thread.title: BRIEF-China Biologic Reports Q4 Adjusted Non-GAAP Earnings Per Share $0.90

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-China Biologic Reports Q4 Adjusted Non-GAAP Earnings Per Share $0.90
text:
Feb 28 (Reuters) - China Biologic Products Holdings Inc :
* CHINA BIOLOGIC REPORTS FINANCIAL RESULTS FOR THE FOURTH QUARTER AND FISCAL YEAR 2017
* Q4 ADJUSTED NON-GAAP EARNINGS PER SHARE $0.90
* Q4 LOSS PER SHARE $0.86 * ‍TOTAL SALES IN Q4 OF 2017 INCREASED BY 12.2% IN RMB TERMS AND 16.1% IN USD TERMS TO $90.1 MILLION
* ‍FOR FULL YEAR OF 2018, COMPANY EXPECTS TOTAL SALES TO GROW 18% TO 20% IN RMB TERMS​
* ‍FOR FULL YEAR OF 2018, EXPECTS NON-GAAP ADJUSTED NET INCOME TO GROW 16% TO 18% IN RMB TERMS
* ‍EXCLUDING TIANXINFU CONTRIBUTION, ESTIMATED SALES FOR 2018 ARE EXPECTED TO GROW 6% TO 8% IN RMB TERMS​
* CHINA BIOLOGIC PRODUCTS HOLDINGS - ‍ EXCLUDING TIANXINFU CONTRIBUTION, FY 2018 NON-GAAP ADJUSTED NET INCOME IS EXPECTED TO GROW 3% TO 4% IN RMB TERMS​ Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
